anya-e0905n:221_0: Vissajjanā – aññatra adhimānāti ayaṃ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n:222_0: Honti ye te ānanda bhikkhū adiṭṭhe diṭṭhasaññino apatte pattasaññino anadhigate adhigatasaññino asacchikate

anya-e0905n:231_1: tasmiṃ āvuso catuttha pārājike asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati,

anya-e0905n:232_5: uttarimanussadhammaṃ bhante ullapanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n:234_1: channaṃ bhante puggalānaṃ anāpatti adhimānena bhaṇantassa anullapanādhippāyassa ummattakassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa ādikammikassa.
anya-e0905n:235_0: Pucchā – pañcannaṃ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṃ katthogadhaṃ kattha pariyāpannaṃ.
anya-e0905n:237_0: Pucchā – katamena āvuso uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n:238_0: Vissajjanā – dutiyena bhante uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n:239_0: Pucchā – catunnaṃ āvuso vipattīnaṃ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n:241_0: Pucchā – sattannaṃ āvuso āpattikkhandhānaṃ katamo āpattikkhandho.
anya-e0905n:243_0: Pucchā – channaṃ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n:244_1: channaṃ bhante āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0905n:245_0: Pucchā – catunnaṃ āvuso adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0905n:247_0: Pucchā – sattannaṃ āvuso samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammati.
anya-e0905n:248_1: sattannaṃ bhante samathānaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati,
anya-e0905n:249_0: Pucchā – ko tattha āvuso vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n:250_0: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante vinayo, vibhatti abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n:251_0: Pucchā – kiṃ āvuso tattha pātimokkhaṃ, kiṃ adhipātimokkhaṃ.
anya-e0905n:252_0: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante pātimokkhaṃ, vibhatti adhipātimokkhaṃ.
anya-e0905n:258_1: na evarūpaṃ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṃ bhante tattha paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n:259_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā catutthaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:260_1: dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā catutthaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:268_0: Vissajjanā – yesaṃ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n:270_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:273_1: atthi nukho āvuso tattha kiñci upanetabbaṃ vā apanetabbaṃ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṃ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṃ vā.
anya-e0905n:277_1: yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:280_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante seyyasakaṃ ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:282_1: āyasmā bhante seyyasako hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocesi,
anya-e0905n:283_0: Pucchā – atthi āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n:284_0: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti, ekā anupaññatti, anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthi.
anya-e0905n:286_0: Vissajjanā – sañcetanikā sukkavissaṭṭhi saṅghādisesoti ayaṃ bhante tattha mūlapaññatti.
anya-e0905n:288_0: Vissajjanā – aññatra supinantāti ayaṃ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n:290_1: sañcetanikā sukkavissaṭṭhi aññatrasupinantā saṅghādisoti ayaṃ bhante tattha paripuṇṇapaññatti.
anya-e0905n:291_0: Pucchā – sādhāraṇa paññattinukho āvuso asādhāraṇa paññattinukho.
anya-e0905n:293_0: Pucchā – tattha āvuso upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocento kati āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n:294_1: upakkamitvā bhante asuciṃ mocento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati,
anya-e0905n:295_0: Saṅghādisesassa, ceteti upakkamati na muccati āpatti thullaccayassa, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
anya-e0905n:297_1: channaṃ bhante anāpatti supinantena mocentassa na mocanādhippāyassa ummattakassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa
anya-e0905n:297_2: ādikammikassa imesaṃ kho bhante channaṃ anāpatti.
anya-e0905n:298_0: Pucchā – pañcannaṃ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṃ katamena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n:299_0: Vissajjanā – pañcannaṃ bhante pātimokkhuddesānaṃ tatiyena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n:300_0: Pucchā – catunnaṃ āvuso vipattīnaṃ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n:307_1: na eva rūpaṃ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṃ bhante paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n:308_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṅghādiseso paññatto.
anya-e0905n:309_1: dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṅghādiseso paññatto saṅghasuṭṭhutāya…pe…
anya-e0905n:313_0: Vissajjanā – yesaṃ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n:315_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:318_1: atthi nukho āvuso tattha sanidāne sapadabhājanīye savinītavatthuke upanetabbaṃ vā apanetabbaṃ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṃ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṃ vā.
anya-e0905n:320_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho āyasmantaṃ vicittasārābhivaṃsaṃ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ paṭhamassa saṅghādisesa sikkhāpadassa nidānampi pucchiṃ,
anya-e0905n:320_8: puṭṭho puṭṭho ca so āyasmā vicittasārābhivaṃso vissajjesi,
anya-e0905n:320_9: itihidaṃ bhante paṭhama saṅghādisesa sikkhāpadaṃ saparivāraṃ nimmalaṃ suparisuddhaṃ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:320_10: Tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṃgītikārā brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya
anya-e0905n:320_11: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ dhammavinayaṃ saṃgāyiṃsuceva anusaṃgāyiṃsuca,
anya-e0905n:320_12: evameva mayampi sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṃgītimahādhammasabhā pariyāpannā idaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṅghādisesa sikkhāpadaṃ
anya-e0905n:320_13: nidānato paṭṭhāya ekaccānaṃ vacasā sajjhāyavasena ekaccānaṃ manasā manasikaraṇavasenaca ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṃ
anya-e0905n:321_2: sammāsambuddhena mātukāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjantassa ca,
anya-e0905n:321_4: mātugāmassa santike attakāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassa ca,
anya-e0905n:321_5: sañcarittaṃ samāpajjantassa ca saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:324_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante udāyittheraṃ ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:326_1: āyasmā bhante udāyitthero mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajji,
anya-e0905n:326_2: āyasmāyeva bhante udāyitthero mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsi,
anya-e0905n:326_3: āyasmāyeva bhante udāyitthero mātugāmassa santike attakāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi,
anya-e0905n:328_2: sammāsambuddhena saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kārāpentassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:331_0: Vissajjanā – āḷavike bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:333_0: Vissajjanā – āḷavikā bhante bhikkhū saññācikāyo kuṭiyo kārāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:335_2: sammāsambuddhena mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpentassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:338_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante channattheraṃ ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:340_1: āyasmā bhante channo vihāravatthuṃ sodhento aññataraṃ cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpesi gāmapūjitaṃ nigamapūjitaṃ nagara pūjitaṃ janapadapūjitaṃ raṭṭhapūjitaṃ,
anya-e0905n:342_2: sammāsambuddhena bhikkhuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsentassa ca,
anya-e0905n:342_3: bhikkhuṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsentassa ca saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:344_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:345_2: mettiyabhūmajakā bhante bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:345_3: teyeva bhante mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ
anya-e0905n:347_2: sammāsambuddhena saṅghabhedakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:349_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattho.
anya-e0905n:351_0: Devadatto bhante samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:353_2: sammāsambuddhena bhedānuvattakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantānaṃ saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:355_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:356_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū devadattassa saṅghābhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā ahesuṃ vaggavādakā,
anya-e0905n:358_2: sammāsambuddhena dubbacassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:360_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:361_2: āyasmā bhante channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0905n:363_2: sammāsambuddhena kuladūsakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:365_0: Pucchā – kaṃ ārabbha āvuso kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:366_1: assaji punabbasuke bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n:366_2: assajipunabbasukā bhante bhikkhū saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakatā chandagāmitā dosagāmitā mohagāmitā bhayagāmitā pāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:368_2: sammāsambuddhena paṭhamo ca aniyato dutiyo ca aniyato kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n:370_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:371_2: āyasmā bhante udāyī mātugāmena saddhiṃ ekoekāya raho paṭicchanne āsane alaṃkammaniye nisajjaṃ kappesi,
anya-e0905n:371_4: āyasmāyeva bhante udāyī mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho nisajjaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0905n:373_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:376_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n:379_1: ahaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ vicittasārābhivaṃsaṃ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ paṭhama duṭṭhadosa sikkhāpadato
anya-e0905n:379_3: so ca āyasmā puṭṭho puṭṭho vissajjeti,
anya-e0905n:379_4: itihidaṃ bhante sabbaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ nimmalaṃ suparisuddhaṃ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa,
anya-e0905n:379_5: tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṃgītikārā brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya
anya-e0905n:379_6: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ saṃgāyiṃsuceva anusaṃgāyiṃsuca,
anya-e0905n:379_7: evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṃgīti mahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā imāni sikkhāpadāni ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṃ katvā saṃgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n:382_2: sammāsambuddhena atirekacīvaraṃ dasāhaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:384_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:387_1: ekarattaṃ āvuso ticivarena vippavasantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:389_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:390_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ hatthe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā santaruttarena janapadacārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:392_1: akālacīvaraṃ āvuso paṭiggahetvā māsaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:394_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:395_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū akālacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā māsaṃ atikkāmesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:397_1: aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:399_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:400_2: āyasmā bhante udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpesi,
anya-e0905n:402_1: aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:404_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:405_2: āyasmā bhante udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvaraṃ paṭiggahesi,
anya-e0905n:407_1: aññātakaṃ āvuso gahapatiṃvā gahatāniṃvā cīvaraṃ viññāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:409_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:410_1: āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:410_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto aññātakaṃ seṭṭhiputtaṃ cīvaraṃ viññāpesi,
anya-e0905n:412_1: aññātakaṃ āvuso gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā tatuttari cīvaraṃ viññāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:414_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:415_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū na mattaṃ jānitvā bahumpi cīvaraṃ viññāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:416_1: pubbe appavāritassa āvuso aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahatāniṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjantassa
anya-e0905n:416_2: ca aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjantassa ca nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā
anya-e0905n:418_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:419_1: āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:419_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajji.
anya-e0905n:419_3: Soyeva bhante āyasmā upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajji,
anya-e0905n:421_1: atirekatikkhattuṃ āvuso codanāya atireka chakkhattuṃ ṭhānena cīvaraṃ abhinipphādentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:423_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:424_1: āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:424_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto upāsakena ajjaṇho bhante āgamehīti vuccamāno nāgamesi,
anya-e0905n:426_1: kosiyamissakaṃ āvuso santhakaṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:428_0: Pucchā – kaṃ 0 āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:429_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kosiyakārake upasaṅkamitvā evamahaṃsu bahū āvuso kosakārake pacatha amhākampi
anya-e0905n:429_3: dassatha mayampi icchāma kosiyamissakaṃ santakaṃ kātunti,
anya-e0905n:431_1: suddhakāḷakānaṃ āvuso eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:433_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:434_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:436_1: anādiyitvā āvuso tulaṃ odātānaṃ tulaṃ gocariyānaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:438_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:439_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū thokaṃyeva odātaṃ ante ādiyitvā tatheva suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:441_2: sammāsambuddhena anuvassaṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:443_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:444_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū anuvassaṃ santhataṃ kārāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:446_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:449_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha koci viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n:452_1: ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ vicittasārābhivaṃsaṃ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ imesaṃ nissaggiyapācittiyasikkhāpadānaṃ
anya-e0905n:452_2: yāva chabbassasikkhāpadaṃ nidānādīni pucchitabbāni anekāni ṭhānāni pucchiṃ,
anya-e0905n:452_3: puṭṭhopuṭṭho ca so āyasmā vicittasārābhivaṃso vissajjesi,
anya-e0905n:452_4: itihidaṃ bhante imāni sikkhāpadāni nimmalāni suparisuddhānī tasseva bhagavato vacanāni arahato sammāsambuddhassa,
anya-e0905n:452_5: tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṃgītikārā brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya
anya-e0905n:452_6: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ dhammavinayaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu ceva anusaṃgāyiṃsu ca,
anya-e0905n:452_7: evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṃgīti mahādhammasabhā pariyāpannā chabbassa nissaggiya sikkhāpadato
anya-e0905n:452_8: paṭṭhāya imāni nissaggiyasikkhāpadāni ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṃ katvā saṃhāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n:454_2: sammāsambuddhena anādiyitvā purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidattiṃ navaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:456_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:457_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū santhatāni ujjhitvā āraññikaṃ piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ paṃsukūlakaṅgaṃ samādiyiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:459_1: eḷakalomāni āvuso paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:461_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:462_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu eḷakalomāni paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaṃ atikkāmesi,
anya-e0905n:464_1: aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā eḷakalomāni dhovāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:466_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:467_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū aññātikāhi bhikkhūnīhi eḷakalomāni dhovāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:469_0: Pucchā – rūpiyaṃ āvuso paṭiggaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:471_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:472_1: āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:472_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto rūpiyaṃ paṭiggahesi,
anya-e0905n:473_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti nāma.
anya-e0905n:474_4: evaṃ kho bhante paṭipajjanto bhikkhu rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti nāma.
anya-e0905n:475_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto bhikkhu rūpiyaṃ na paṭiggaṇhāti nāma.
anya-e0905n:476_1: yathā bhante rājasikkhāpade yathā ca bhante meṇḍakasikkhāpade āgacchati,
anya-e0905n:476_2: tathā bhante paṭipajjanto bhikkhu rūpiyaṃ na paṭiggaṇhātināma.
anya-e0905n:478_0: Pucchā – rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ āvuso samāpajjantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:480_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:481_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:483_1: nānappakārakaṃ āvuso kayavikkayaṃ āpajjantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:485_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:486_1: āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:486_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto paribbājakena saddhi kayavikkayaṃ samāpajji,
anya-e0905n:487_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto bhikkhu kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjatināma.
anya-e0905n:488_1: iminā imaṃ dehi iminā imaṃ āhara iminā imaṃ parivattehi iminā imaṃ cetāmehīti ajjhācarati,
anya-e0905n:488_2: evaṃ kho bhante paṭipajjanto kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjatināma.
anya-e0905n:489_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto bhikkhu na kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjatināma.
anya-e0905n:490_3: yo ca bhante amhākañca idaṃ atthi amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca atthoti bhaṇati,
anya-e0905n:490_4: evaṃ kho bhante paṭipajjanto bhikkhu na kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjatināma.
anya-e0905n:492_0: Pucchā – atirekapattaṃ āvuso dasāhaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:494_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:497_1: ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:499_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:500_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū appamattakenapi bhinnena appamattakenapi khaṇḍena vilikhitamattenapi bahū patte viyyāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:501_0: Na bhikkhave patto viññāpetabbo, yo viññāpeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa.
anya-e0905n:503_1: bhesajjāni āvuso paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:505_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:506_1: sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:506_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ atikkāmesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:508_1: atirekamāse sese gimāne āvuso vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:510_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:511_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū atirekamāse sese gimhāne vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:513_1: bhikkhussa āvuso sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā kupitena anattamanena acchindantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:515_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:516_1: āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:516_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā kupito anattamano acchindi,
anya-e0905n:518_1: sāmaṃ āvuso suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:520_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:521_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:523_1: pubbe appavāritassa āvuso aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:525_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:526_1: āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:526_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajji,
anya-e0905n:528_1: acceka cīvaraṃ āvuso paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:530_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:531_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū accekacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:533_1: tiṇṇaṃ āvuso cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṃ vippavasantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:535_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:536_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṃ vippavasiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:538_1: yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ atthano pariṇāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:540_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:541_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:542_0: Pucchā – jānaṃ āvuso saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmento, kati āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n:543_1: jānaṃ bhante saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmento dve āpattiyo āpajjati,
anya-e0905n:543_4: jānaṃ bhante saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmento imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n:545_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:548_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso tattha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n:551_1: ahaṃ bhante imesaṃ soḷasannaṃ nissaggiyapācittiyasikkhāpadānaṃ nidānādīni anekāni pucchitabbāni āyasmantaṃ
anya-e0905n:551_4: itihidaṃ bhante sikkhāpadasañjātaṃ nimmalaṃ su parisuddhaṃ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa,
anya-e0905n:551_5: tasmā yathā pure mahākassapādayo mahāthera varā porāṇasaṃgītikārā brahmacariyasaṅkhātassa buddhasāsanassa
anya-e0905n:551_6: ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ dhammavinayaṃ
anya-e0905n:551_8: evameva mayampi dāni chaṭṭhasaṃgīti mahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā imāni sikkhāpadāni yathānuppattaṭṭhānato
anya-e0905n:554_1: yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:555_3: hatthako bhante sakyaputto titthiyehi saddhiṃ sallapanto avajānitvā paṭijānāti paṭijānitvā avajānāti,
anya-e0905n:557_1: omasavāde pācittiyañca āvuso bhikkhupesuññe pācittiyañca bhagavatā katthapaññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:558_3: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍantā omasiṃsu tasmiṃca vatthusmiṃ,
anya-e0905n:558_4: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ pesuññaṃ upasaṃhariṃsu,
anya-e0905n:560_1: anupasampannaṃ āvuso padaso vācentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:561_3: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū upāsake padaso dhammaṃ vācesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:563_1: anupasampannena āvuso uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:564_3: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:565_0: Pucchā – kesaṃ āvuso ettha anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappentānampi anāpatti hoti.
anya-e0905n:566_1: ekādasannaṃ bhante puggalānaṃ anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappentānaṃ anāpatti,
anya-e0905n:566_4: dverattiyo vasitvā tatiyāyarattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati,
anya-e0905n:566_13: imesaṃkho bhante ekādasannaṃ puggalānaṃ anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappentānaṃ anāpatti.
anya-e0905n:568_1: mātugāmena āvuso sahaseyyaṃ kappentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:569_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:569_2: āyasmā bhante anuruddho mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappesi,
anya-e0905n:571_1: mātugāmassa āvuso uttari chappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ desentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:572_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:574_1: anupasampannassa āvuso uttarimanussadhammaṃ bhūtaṃ ārocentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:575_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:575_2: vaggumudātīriyā bhante bhikkhū gihīnaṃ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:577_1: bhikkhussa āvuso duṭṭhullāpattiṃ anupasampannassa ārocentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:578_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:578_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhussa duṭṭhullāpattiṃ anupasampannassa ārocesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:581_1: āḷaviyaṃ bhante āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:583_1: bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiyaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:584_1: āḷaviyaṃ bhante āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:584_2: āḷavikā bhante bhikkhū rukkhaṃ chindiṃ su,
anya-e0905n:586_1: aññavādake vihesake pācittiyaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:587_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:587_2: āyasmā bhante channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṃ paṭicari,
anya-e0905n:589_1: ujjhāpanake khiyyanake pācittiyaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:590_1: rājagahe bhante mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:590_2: mettiyabhūmajakā bhante bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ bhikkhū ujjhāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:592_1: saṅghikaṃ āvuso mañcaṃvā pīṭhaṃvā bhisiṃvā kocchaṃvā ajjhokāse santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:593_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:593_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ ajjhokāse santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:595_1: saṅghike āvuso vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:596_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:596_2: sattarasavaggiyā bhante bhikkhū saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:598_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavatā bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:601_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n:604_1: ahaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ vicittasārābhivaṃsaṃ imesaṃ pannarasannaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ nidānādīni pucchitabbāni anekāni ṭhānāni pucchiṃ,
anya-e0905n:604_3: iti hidaṃ bhante nimmalaṃ suparisuddhaṃ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa,
anya-e0905n:604_4: tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṃgītikārā brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya
anya-e0905n:604_5: bahujanasukhāya lonukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ dhammavinayaṃ saṃgāyiṃsuceva anusaṃgāyiṃsuca,
anya-e0905n:604_6: evameva mayampi dāni chaṭṭhasaṃgītimahādhammasabhā pariyāpannā yathānuppaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya imāni sikkhāpadāni ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṃ katvā saṃgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n:606_2: sammāsambuddhena saṅghike vihāre jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:607_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:607_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū there bhikkhū anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:609_1: bhikkhuṃ āvuso kupitena anattamanena saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhentassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:610_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:610_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā bhikkhū saṅghikāvihārā nikkaḍḍhiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:612_1: uparivehāsakuṭiyā āvuso āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃvā pīṭhaṃvā abhinisīdantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:613_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:613_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsa kuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ sahasā abhinisīdi,
anya-e0905n:615_1: dvatti pariyāye āvuso adhiṭṭhahitvā tatuttari adhiṭṭhahantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:616_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:616_2: āyasmā bhante chando katapariyositaṃ vihāraṃ punappunaṃ chādāpesi punappunaṃ lepāpesi,
anya-e0905n:618_1: jānaṃ āvuso sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇaṃvā mattikaṃvā siñcantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:619_1: āḷaviyaṃ bhante āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:619_2: āḷavikā bhante bhikkhū jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇampi mattikampi siñciṃsu,
anya-e0905n:621_1: asammatena āvuso bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:622_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:622_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū asammatā bhikkhuniyo ovadiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:624_1: atthaṅgate āvuso sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:625_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ cūḷapanthakaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:625_2: āyasmā bhante cūḷapanthako atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadi,
anya-e0905n:627_1: bhikkhunupassayaṃ āvuso upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadantassaca āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti
anya-e0905n:628_1: bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṃ bhante sakkesu chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:628_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:628_3: āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti bhaṇantassa pācittiyaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:628_4: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti bhaṇiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:630_1: aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ dentassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:631_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:631_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ adāsi,
anya-e0905n:633_1: aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbentassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:634_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:634_2: āyasmā bhante udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbesi,
anya-e0905n:636_1: bhikkhunayā āvuso saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:637_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:637_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:639_1: bhikkhuniyā āvuso saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:640_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:640_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:642_1: jānaṃ āvuso bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:643_2: devadatto bhante jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñji,
anya-e0905n:645_1: bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ āvuso eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappentassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:646_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:646_2: āyasmā bhante udāyī bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappesi,
anya-e0905n:648_1: tatuttari āvuso āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:649_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:649_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṃ paribhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:651_1: gaṇabhojane pācittiyaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:652_2: devadatto bhante sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā bhuñji,
anya-e0905n:654_1: parampara bhojane pācittiyaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:655_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:655_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū aññatra nimantitā aññatra bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:657_1: dvattipattapūraṃ pūvaṃ paṭiggahetvā tatuttari paṭiggaṇhantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:658_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:658_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū na mattaṃ jānitvā pūvaṃ paṭiggahesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:660_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:663_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n:666_2: sammāsambuddhena bhuttāvinā parivātena anatirittaṃ khādanīyaṃvā bhojanīyaṃvā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:667_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:667_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhuttāvī pavāritā aññatra bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:669_1: bhikkhuṃ āvuso bhuttāviṃ pavāritaṃ anatirittena khādanīyena bhojanīyena abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavārentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:670_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:670_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ bhuttāviṃ pavāritaṃ anatirittena bhojanīyena abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāresi,
anya-e0905n:672_1: vikāle āvuso khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:673_1: rājagahe bhante sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:673_2: sattarasavaggiyā bhante bhikkhū vikāle bhojanaṃ bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:675_1: sannidhikārakaṃ āvuso khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:676_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ belaṭṭhasīsaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:676_2: āyasmā bhante belaṭṭhasīso sannidhikārakaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñji,
anya-e0905n:678_1: paṇīta bhojanāni āvuso attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:679_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:679_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:681_1: adinnaṃ āvuso mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āharantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:682_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:682_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhari,
anya-e0905n:684_1: acelakassavā āvuso paribbājakassavā paribbājikāyavā sahatthā khādanīyaṃvā bhojanīyaṃvā dentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:685_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:685_2: āyasmā bhante ānando aññatarissā paribbājikāya ekaṃ maññamāno dve pūve adāsi,
anya-e0905n:687_1: bhikkhuṃ ehāvuso gāmaṃvā nigamaṃvā piṇḍāya pavisissāmāti tassa dāpetvāvā adāpetvāvā uyyojentassa āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:688_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:688_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto bhikkhu ehāvuso gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisissāmāti tassa adāpetvā uyyojesi,
anya-e0905n:690_1: sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappentassa āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:691_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:691_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappesi,
anya-e0905n:693_1: mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappentassaca āvuso mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho
anya-e0905n:694_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:694_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappesi,
anya-e0905n:694_3: mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappesi,
anya-e0905n:696_1: nimantitena āvuso sabhattena santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃvā pacchābhattaṃvā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:697_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:697_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ āpajji,
anya-e0905n:699_1: tatuttari āvuso bhesajjaṃ viññāpentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:700_1: sakkesu bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:700_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū mahānāmena sakkena ajjaṇho bhante āgametāti vuccamānā nāgamesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:702_1: uyyuttaṃ āvuso senaṃ dassanāya gacchantassa ca atirekatirattaṃ senāya vasantassa ca uyyodhikaṃ gacchantassa ca pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:703_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:703_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya agamaṃsu,
anya-e0905n:703_3: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atirekatirattaṃ senāya vasiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:703_4: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uyyodhikaṃ agamaṃsu,
anya-e0905n:705_0: Pucchā – surāmerayapāne āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:706_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ sāgataṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:708_0: Pucchā – aṅgulipatodake āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:709_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:709_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ aṅgulipatodakena hāsesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:711_1: udake hasadhamme āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:712_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:712_2: sattarasavaggiyā bhante bhikkhū aciravatiyā nadiyā udake kīḷiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:714_0: Pucchā – anādariya āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:715_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:715_2: āyasmā bhante channo āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno anādariyaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0905n:717_1: bhikkhuṃ bhiṃsāpentassa āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:718_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:720_1: jotiṃ āvuso samādahitvā visibbentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:721_1: bhaggesu bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:721_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū jotiṃ samādapetvā visibbesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:723_1: orenaddhamāsaṃ āvuso nahāyantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:724_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:724_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū rājānampi passitvā na mattaṃ jānitvā nahāyiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:726_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:729_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viruddhadoso.
anya-e0905n:732_2: sammāsambuddhena anādiyitvā tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:733_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:733_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū attano cīvaraṃ na sañjāniṃsu,
anya-e0905n:735_1: bhikkhussa āvuso pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā nisīdanaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vā apanidhentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:736_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:736_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ pattampi cīvarampi apanidhesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:738_1: sañcicca āvuso pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:739_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ āyasmā bhante udāyī sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropesi,
anya-e0905n:741_1: jānaṃ āvuso sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:742_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:742_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:744_1: jānaṃ āvuso theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:745_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:745_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajji,
anya-e0905n:747_1: mātugāmena saddhiṃ āvuso saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:748_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:748_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajji,
anya-e0905n:750_1: bhikkhūhi āvuso sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānena na tāvāhaṃ āvuso etasmiṃ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi,
anya-e0905n:750_2: yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchissāmīti bhaṇantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:751_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:751_2: āyasmā bhante channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno na tāvāhaṃ āvuso etasmiṃ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi,
anya-e0905n:751_3: yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchissāmīti bhaṇi,
anya-e0905n:753_1: vinayaṃ vivaṇṇentassa āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:754_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:756_0: Pucchā – mohanake āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:757_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:758_1: bhikkhussa āvuso kupitena anattamanena pahāraṃ dentassa ca talasattikaṃ uggirantassa ca pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:759_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:759_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pahāraṃ adaṃsu,
anya-e0905n:761_1: bhikkhussa āvuso sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:762_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:762_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:764_1: bhikkhūnaṃ āvuso bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādā pannānaṃ upassutiṃ tiṭṭhantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:765_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:765_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalaha jātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ upassutiṃ tiṭṭhahiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:767_1: dhammikānaṃ āvuso kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:768_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:768_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:770_1: saṅghe āvuso vinicchakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:771_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:771_2: aññataro bhante chabbaggiyo bhikkhu saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi,
anya-e0905n:773_1: jānaṃ āvuso saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:774_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:774_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:776_1: pubbe appaṭisaṃviditena āvuso rañño antepuraṃ pavisantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:777_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:777_2: āyasmā bhante ānando pubbe appaṭisaṃvidito rañño antepuraṃ pāvisi,
anya-e0905n:779_1: ratanaṃ āvuso uggaṇhantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:780_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:782_1: santaṃ āvuso bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṃ pavisantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:783_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:783_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṃ pavisiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:786_1: sekkhasammatesu āvuso kulesu khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjantassa pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:787_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:787_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū namattaṃ jānitvā paṭiggahesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:789_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambentena nivāsentassaca pārupantassaca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:790_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:790_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū purato ca pacchato ca olambantā nivāsesuṃceva pārupiṃsuca,
anya-e0905n:791_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca kāyaṃ vivaritvā antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:792_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggīye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:792_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kāyaṃ vivaritvā antaraghare gacchiṃsu ceva nisīdiṃsuca,
anya-e0905n:793_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā kīḷāpentena antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca,
anya-e0905n:793_2: tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentena antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca,
anya-e0905n:793_3: ukkhittakāya antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:794_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:794_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū hatthampi pādampi kīḷāpentā tahaṃ tahaṃpi olokentā antaraghare gacchiṃsuceva nisīdiṃsu ca,
anya-e0905n:794_3: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ukkhittakāya antaraghare gacchiṃsuceva nisīdiṃsuca,
anya-e0905n:795_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca ujjagghikāya vā uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karontena vā antaraghare gacchantassaca nisīdantassaca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:796_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:796_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū mahāhasitaṃ hasantā ca uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karontā ca antaraghare gacchiṃsuceva nisīdiṃsuca,
anya-e0905n:797_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca kāyappacālakaṃ vā bāhuppa cālakaṃ vā sīsappacālakaṃ vā khambhakatena vā oguṇṭhitena
anya-e0905n:797_2: vā antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca ukkuṭikāya kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:798_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:798_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kāyappacālakaṃ bāhuppacālakaṃ sīsappacālakaṃ karontā ca khambhīkatā ca oguṇṭhitā ca antaraghare gacchiṃsuceva nisīdiṃsuca,
anya-e0905n:799_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca pallatthikāya antaraghare nisinnassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:800_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:800_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū pallatthikāya antaraghare nisīdiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:801_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca asakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa ca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentena piṇḍapātaṃ
anya-e0905n:801_2: paṭiggaṇhantassaca sūpaññeva bahuṃ paṭiggaṇhantassaca thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassaca dukkaṭaṃ
anya-e0905n:802_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:802_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū asakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggahesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:803_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca āsakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassaca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentana piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa
anya-e0905n:803_2: ca tahaṃ tahaṃ omasitvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa ca sūpaññeva bahuṃ bhuñjantassa ca thūpakato omadditvā
anya-e0905n:803_3: piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa ca sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā odanena paṭicchādentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:804_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:804_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū asakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:804_4: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tahaṃ tahaṃ omasitvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:804_5: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bahuṃ sūpaṃ bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:804_6: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:804_7: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sūpampi byañjanampi odanena paṭicchādesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:805_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca sūpaṃvā odanaṃvā agilānena attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:806_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:806_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:807_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca ujjhānasaññinā paresaṃ pattaṃ olokentassa ca atimahantaṃ kabaḷaṃ karontassa
anya-e0905n:807_2: ca dīghaṃ ālopaṃ karontassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:808_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:808_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū ujjhānasaññino paresaṃ pattaṃ olokesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:808_3: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atimahantaṃ kabaḷaṃ kariṃsu,
anya-e0905n:808_4: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dīghaṃ ālopaṃ kariṃsu,
anya-e0905n:809_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṃ vivarantassa ca bhuñjamāne sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipantassa
anya-e0905n:809_2: ca sakabaḷena mukhena byāharantassa ca piṇḍukkhepakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa ca kabaḷāvacchedakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ
anya-e0905n:809_3: bhuñjantassa ca avagaṇḍakārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa ca hatthaniddhunakaṃ sitthāvakārakaṃ jivhānicchārakaṃ
anya-e0905n:809_4: capucapukārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:810_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:810_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṃ vivariṃsu,
anya-e0905n:811_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca surusurukārakaṃ bhuñjantassaca hatthanillehakaṃvā pattanillehakaṃ vā oṭṭhanillehakaṃ
anya-e0905n:811_2: vā bhuñjantassa ca sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa ca sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare
anya-e0905n:812_1: suru surukārakaṃ bhante bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ kosambiyaṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:812_3: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū surusurukārakaṃ khīraṃ piviṃsu,
anya-e0905n:812_5: Hatthanillehakaṃ bhuñjantassa ca pattanillehakaṃ bhuñjantassa ca oṭṭhanillehakaṃ bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:813_0: Sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa ca sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhaggesu paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:813_2: sambahulā bhikkhū sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:813_3: teyeva bhante sambahulā bhikkhū sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:814_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca chattapāṇissa dhammaṃ desentassa ca daṇḍapāṇissa vā satthapāṇissa vā āvudhapāṇissa
anya-e0905n:814_2: vā dhammaṃ desentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:815_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:815_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū chattapāṇissa daṇḍapāṇissa satthapāṇissa āvudhapāṇissa dhammaṃ desesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:816_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca pādukāruḷhassa ca upahanāruḷhassa ca yānagatassa ca sayanagatassa ca dhammaṃ desentassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:817_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:817_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū pādukāruḷhassa upahanāruḷhassa yānagatassa sayanagatassa dhammaṃ desesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:818_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca pallatthikāya nisinnassa ca veṭhitasīsassa ca oguṇṭhitasīsassa ca chamāyaṃ nisīditvā
anya-e0905n:818_2: āsane nisinnassa ca nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa ca ṭhitena nisinnassa ca pacchato gacchantena
anya-e0905n:818_3: purato gacchantassa ca uppathena gacchantena pathena gacchantassa ca dhammaṃ desentassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha
anya-e0905n:819_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:819_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū pallatthikāya nisinnassa ca veṭhitasīsassa ca oguṇṭhitasīsassa ca chamāyaṃ
anya-e0905n:819_3: nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa ca nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa ca ṭhitānisinnassa ca pacchato
anya-e0905n:819_4: gacchantā purato gacchantassa ca uppathena gacchantā pathena gacchantassa ca dhammaṃ desesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:820_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca ṭhitena uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karontassa ca harite vā udake vā uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ
anya-e0905n:820_2: vā kheḷaṃ vā karontassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:821_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:821_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū ṭhitā uccārampi passāvampi akaṃsu,
anya-e0905n:821_3: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū haritepi udakepi uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi akaṃsu,
anya-e0905n:824_1: bhikkhunīnaṃ āvuso pañcama pārājikaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:825_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sundarīnandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:825_2: sundarīnandā bhante bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyi,
anya-e0905n:827_1: ussayavādikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā aḍḍaṃ karontiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto,
anya-e0905n:828_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante tullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n:829_1: coriṃ āvuso vuṭṭhāpentiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto,
anya-e0905n:830_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n:831_1: ekāya āvuso gāmantaraṃ gacchantiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto,
anya-e0905n:832_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n:832_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gacchi,
anya-e0905n:833_1: avassutāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṃvā bhojanīyaṃvā sahatthā
anya-e0905n:834_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sundarīnandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n:834_2: sundarīnandā bhante bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato āmisaṃ paṭiggahesi tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n:835_1: kupitāya āvuso anattamanāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsantiyā na paṭinisajjantiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto,
anya-e0905n:836_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n:836_2: caṇḍakāḷī bhante bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ abhaṇi,
anya-e0905n:838_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:841_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n:845_2: sammāsambuddhena lakkhaṇaṃ khādantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:846_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:846_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī na mattaṃ jānitvā bahuṃ lasuṇaṃ harāpesi,
anya-e0905n:848_1: bhikkhussa āvuso bhuñjamānassa annena vā pānena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhantiyā bhikkhuniyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:849_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:849_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjamānassa pānīyena vidhūpanena ca upatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0905n:851_1: uccāraṃvā āvuso passāvaṃvā saṅkāraṃvā vighāsaṃvā thirokuṭṭe chaḍḍentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:852_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:852_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī uccāraṃ tirokuṭṭe chaḍḍesi,
anya-e0905n:854_1: naccaṃ vā āvuso gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gacchantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:855_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:855_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo naccampi gītampi vāditampi dassanāya agamaṃsu,
anya-e0905n:856_1: bhikkhupana āvuso naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gacchanto kaṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0905n:859_1: rattandhakāre āvuso apadīpe purisena saddhiṃ ekenekāya santiṭṭhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:860_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:860_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī rattandhakāre apadīpe purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhi,
anya-e0905n:862_1: paṭicchanne vā āvuso okāse ajjhokāse vā purisena saddhiṃ ekenekāya santiṭṭhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:863_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:863_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī paṭicchanne okāse ajjhokāse ca purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhi,
anya-e0905n:865_1: duggahitena āvuso dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:866_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:866_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpesi,

anya-e0905n:869_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,

anya-e0905n:871_1: attānaṃ āvuso vadhitvā vadhitvā rodantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:872_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:872_2: caṇḍakāḷī bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodi,
anya-e0905n:874_1: bhikkhuniyā āvuso cīvaraṃ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā neva sibbentiyā na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karontiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,

anya-e0905n:877_1: agārikassa vā āvuso paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā samaṇacīvaraṃ dentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,

anya-e0905n:881_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:881_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭesuṃ,

anya-e0905n:889_1: bhikkhuniyā āvuso upassayaṃ datvā kupitāya anattamanāya nikkaḍḍhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:890_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃyeva bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,

anya-e0905n:893_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,

anya-e0905n:896_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhepi tiroraṭṭhepi sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikāyo cārikaṃ cariṃsu,
anya-e0905n:898_1: antovassaṃ āvuso cārikaṃ carantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
