anya-e0905n:899_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:901_1: vassaṃ vuṭṭhāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cārikaṃ na pakkamantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:902_1: rājagahe bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbhaṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:902_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo vassaṃvuṭṭhā cārikaṃ na pakkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:904_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:909_2: sammāsambuddhena rājāgāraṃ vā cittāgāraṃ vā ārāmaṃ vā uyyānaṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā dassanāya gacchantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:910_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:910_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo rājāgārampi cittāgārampi dassanāya gacchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:912_1: gihiveyyāvaccaṃ āvuso karontiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:913_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:915_1: agārikassa vā āvuso paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ dentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:916_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:916_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī agārikassa sahatthā khādanīyampi bhojanīyampi adāsi,
anya-e0905n:918_1: tiracchānavijjaṃ āvuso pariyāpuṇantiyā ca vācentiyā ca pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:919_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:919_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇiṃsuceva vācesuñca,
anya-e0905n:920_1: bhikkhu pana āvuso tādisaṃ tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇanto ca vācento ca kiṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0905n:923_1: jānaṃ āvuso sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmaṃ anāpucchā pavisantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:924_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:924_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo ārāmaṃ anāpucchā pavisiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:926_1: bhikkhuṃ āvuso akkosantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:927_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:927_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ akkosiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:929_1: caṇḍikatāya āvuso gaṇaṃ paribhāsantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:930_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:930_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī caṇḍikatāya gaṇaṃ paribhāsi,
anya-e0905n:932_1: kulaṃ āvuso maccharāyantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:933_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:935_1: abhikkhuke āvuso āvāse vassaṃ vasantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:936_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:936_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:938_1: vassaṃ vuṭṭhāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavārentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:939_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:939_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo vassaṃ vuṭṭhā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ na pavāresuṃ,
anya-e0905n:941_1: ovādāya vā āvuso saṃvāsāya vā nagacchantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:942_1: sakkesu bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:944_1: uposathampi āvuso na pucchantiyā ovādampi na yācantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:945_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:945_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo uposathaṃ na pucchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:947_1: gabbhiniṃ vā āvuso pāyantiṃ vā vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:948_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:950_1: dve vassāni āvuso chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:951_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:951_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:953_1: purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ āvuso kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:954_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:954_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ sekkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0905n:956_1: mātāpitūhi vā āvuso sāmikena vā ananuññātaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:957_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:957_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī mātāpitūhipi sāmikenapi ananuññātaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0905n:959_1: chattupāhanaṃ āvuso dhārentiyā ca yānena yāyantiyā ca pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:960_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:962_1: itthālaṅkāraṃ āvuso dhārentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:963_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:964_0: Pucchā – bhikkhu pana āvuso purisālaṅkāraṃ dhārento kiṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpajjeyya.
anya-e0905n:967_1: gandhavaṇṇakena āvuso nahāyantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:968_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:970_1: bhikkhussa āvuso purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:971_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:971_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:973_1: anokāsakataṃ āvuso bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:974_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:974_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:975_1: sappiṃ vā āvuso telaṃ vā madhuṃ vā phāṇitaṃ vā macchaṃ vā maṃsaṃ vā khīraṃ vā dadhiṃ vā viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:976_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:976_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo sappimpi telampi madhumpi phāṇitampi macchampi maṃsampi khīrampi dadhimpi viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:977_0: Pucchā – catunnaṃ āvuso vipattīnaṃ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n:979_0: Pucchā – channaṃ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n:980_4: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0905n:980_6: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, navācato,
anya-e0905n:980_7: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0905n:986_1: na evarūpaṃ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu,
anya-e0905n:988_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:994_1: ubhato vibhaṅgānantaraṃ āvuso porāṇakehi saṃgītikāramahātherehi kaṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgītaṃ.
anya-e0905n:995_0: Vissajjanā – ubhato vibhaṅgānantaraṃ bhante porāṇakehi saṃgītikāramahātherehi khandhakā saṃgītā.
anya-e0905n:996_0: Pucchā – te pana āvuso khandhakā vaggabhedena katividhā.
anya-e0905n:997_0: Vissajjanā – te pana bhante khandhakā duvidhā vaggabhedena mahāvaggo cūḷavaggoti.
anya-e0905n:998_0: Pucchā – mahāvagge āvuso kati khandhakā pariyāpannā.
anya-e0905n:999_3: mahākhandhako uposathakkhandhako vassūpanāyikakkhandhako pavāraṇākkhandhako cammakkhandhako bhesajjakkhandhako
anya-e0905n:1000_0: Pucchā – mahākhandhake āvuso bahū kathāyo, katamā tāsaṃ ādikathā.
anya-e0905n:1004_1: tasmātiha āvuso tato paṭṭhāya taṃ pucchissāmi,
anya-e0905n:1004_2: bhagavā āvuso paṭhamābhisambuddhakāle kattha kīvacīraṃ kenākārena vihāsi.
anya-e0905n:1005_1: bhagavā bhante paṭhamābhisambuddho bodhirukkhamūle sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena vihāsi vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedī.
anya-e0905n:1006_0: Pucchā – tadā āvuso bhagavā kīdisaṃ dhammaṃ manasikatvā kīdisaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
anya-e0905n:1007_1: tadā bhante bhagavā rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ rattiyā majjhimaṃ yāmaṃ rattiyā pacchimaṃ yāmaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
anya-e0905n:1007_2: anulomaṃ paṭilomaṃ manasikatvā tīṇi udānāni udānesi.
anya-e0905n:1009_0: Pucchā – tassa āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n:1010_1: tassa bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā ajapāla nigrodhamūle vihāsi,
anya-e0905n:1012_0: Pucchā – tassapi āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n:1013_0: Vissajjanā – tassa bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā mucalindamūle sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi.
anya-e0905n:1014_0: Pucchā – tassapi āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n:1015_1: tassapi bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā rājāyatanamūle sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedī.
anya-e0905n:1016_0: Pucchā – tassapi āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n:1017_0: Vissajjanā – tassa bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā punadeva ajapālanigrodhamūle vihāsi.
anya-e0905n:1018_0: Pucchā – tasmiṃ pana āvuso ajapālanigrodhe viharantassa bhagavato kathaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi.
anya-e0905n:1019_1: tasmiṃ pana bhante ajapālanigrodhe viharantassa bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa dhammagambhīratāpaṭisaṃyutto cetaso parivitakko udapādi.
anya-e0905n:1020_0: Adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo gambhīro duddaso aranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacarā nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo.
anya-e0905n:1023_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso tadā dhammadesanāya brahmayācanā ca bhagavato paṭiññāca ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1024_3: santi sattā apparajakkhajātikā assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti,
anya-e0905n:1024_4: bhavissanti dhammassa aññātāroti iti bhante brahmuno dhammadesanāya yācanā ahosi,
anya-e0905n:1029_0: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavato dhammadesanāya paṭiññā ca ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1034_1: evaṃ kho āvuso bhagavā dhammadesanāya paṭiññaṃ katvā paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ desento kattha kīdisaṃ dhammaṃ kassa desesi.
anya-e0905n:1035_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante isipatane migadāye pañcavaggiya bhikkhupamukhānaṃ brahmagaṇānaṃ dhammacakkapavattanasuttaṃ desesi.
anya-e0905n:1036_1: tasmiṃ kho pana āvuso dhammacakkapavattanasutte desiyamāne manussaloke kassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1037_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmato bhante koṇḍaññassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1038_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ nu kho āvuso imasmiṃ buddhasāsane paṭhamaṃ pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1039_0: Vissajjanā – imasmiṃ bhante buddhasāsane paṭhamaṃ ehibhikkhupasampadā ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1040_0: Labheyyāhaṃ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1041_0: Ehi bhikkhu svākhāto dhammo, cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāya.
anya-e0905n:1042_0: Pucchā – itaresaṃ pana āvuso catunnaṃ pañcavaggiyānaṃ kadā dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1043_4: catutthe bhante divase āyasmato assajissa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1044_0: Pucchā – sabbesampi āvuso tesaṃ pañcavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kadā arahattapatti hoti.
anya-e0905n:1045_1: sabbesampi bhante tesaṃ pañcavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pakkhassa pañcamiyaṃ anattalakkhaṇasutte desiyamāne arahattapatti hoti.
anya-e0905n:1046_0: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhagavatā bhikkhū tattha tattha cārikaṃ caritvā dhammadesanatthāya pesitā.
anya-e0905n:1047_1: yasappamukhānaṃ bhante catupaññāsa sahāyakānaṃ pabbajitakāle bhagavatā bhikkhū tattha tattha cārikaṃ caritvā dhammadesanatthāya pesitā.
anya-e0905n:1049_0: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjūpa sampadā anuññāto ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1050_1: yasappamukhānaṃ bhante catupaññāsāya gihi sahāyakānaṃ pabbajitvā tattha tattha cārikaṃ caritvā dhammadesanatthāya
anya-e0905n:1050_2: pesitakāle bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1051_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave tumheva dāni tāsu tāsu disāsu tesu tesu janapadesu pabbājetha upasampādetha.
anya-e0905n:1052_0: Pucchā – bhagavatā āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ ārāmo paṭiggaṇhituṃ kattha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññāto.
anya-e0905n:1053_1: bhagavatā bhante bhikkhūnaṃ ārāmaṃ paṭiggaṇhituṃ rājagahe anuññāto,
anya-e0905n:1053_2: rājā bhante māgadho seniyo bimbisāro buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa veḷuvanaṃ uyyānaṃ adāsi,
anya-e0905n:1054_0: Etāhaṃ bhante veḷuvanaṃ uyyānaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dammi –
anya-e0905n:1056_0: Pucchā – kathañca āvuso dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ pabbajjūpasampadā ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1057_0: Vissajjanā – dvinnaṃ bhante aggasāvakānaṃ ehi bhikkhupasampadā ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1064_0: Ye dhammā hetuppabhavā, tesaṃ hetuṃ tathāgato;
anya-e0905n:1065_0: Āha tesañca yo nirodho, evaṃ vādī mahāsamaṇo.
anya-e0905n:1067_0: Ete bhikkhave dve sahāyakā āgacchanti kolito upatisso ca etaṃ me sāvakayugaṃ bhavissati aggaṃ bhaddayugaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1068_0: Labheyyāma mayaṃ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ labheyyāma upasampadaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1069_0: Etha bhikkhavo svākhāto dhammo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāya.
anya-e0905n:1070_0: Pucchā – upajjhāyo āvuso gaṇhituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññāto, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññāto.
anya-e0905n:1071_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññāto,
anya-e0905n:1071_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū anupajjhāyakā anācariyakā anovadiyamānā ananusāsiyamānā dunnivatthā duppārutā anokappasampannā piṇḍāya cariṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1072_1: upajjhāyamhi āvuso na sammāvattantassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1073_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule saddhivihārike ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1073_2: sambahulā bhante saddhivihārikā upajjhāyamhi na sammāvattiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1074_1: kadā āvuso bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ñāticatutthena kammena upasampadā anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1075_1: rādhabrāhmaṇassa bhante pabbajitakāle bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ñātticatutthena kammena upasampadā anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1076_0: Konu kho bhikkhave tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṃ sarati.
anya-e0905n:1077_0: Ahaṃ kho bhante tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṃ sarāmi.
anya-e0905n:1078_0: Sādhu sādhu sāriputta, kataññuno hi sāriputta sappurisā katavedino.
anya-e0905n:1080_0: Yāsā bhikkhave mayā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadāanuññātā, taṃ ajjatagge paṭikkhipāmi.
anya-e0905n:1082_1: ayācitakaṃ āvuso upasampadāpekkhaṃ upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1083_1: rājagahe bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1083_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu upasampannasamanantaraṃ anācāraṃ acari,
anya-e0905n:1084_1: catunnaṃ āvuso nissayānaṃ ācikkhaṇā bhagavatā kattha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n:1085_1: rājagahe bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n:1085_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu udarassa kāraṇā pabbaji,
anya-e0905n:1087_0: Kathañhi nāma bhikkhu evaṃ svākkhāte dhammavinaye udarassa kāraṇā pabbajissati.
anya-e0905n:1088_1: ūnadasavassena āvuso upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1089_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ upasenaṃ vaṅgantaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1089_2: āyasmā bhante upaseno vaṅgantaputto ekavasso saddhivihārikaṃ upasampādesi,
anya-e0905n:1090_1: bālena āvuso abyattena upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1091_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1091_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū “dasavassamhā dasavassamhā”ti bālā abyattā upasampādesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1092_0: Pucchā – ācariyo āvuso gaṇhituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññāto, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññāto.
anya-e0905n:1093_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññāto,
anya-e0905n:1093_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū upajjhāyesu pakkantesupi vibbhantesupi kālaṅkatesupi pakkhasaṅkantesupi anācariyakā
anya-e0905n:1093_3: anovadiyamānā ananusāsiyamānā dunnivatthā duppārutā anākappasampannā piṇḍāya cariṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1094_1: pañcahi āvuso ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṃ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1095_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1095_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṃ pabbājesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1096_0: Sādhu bhante ayyā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṃ na pabbājeyyuṃ…
anya-e0905n:1097_1: rājabhaṭaṃ āvuso pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1098_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1099_1: dhajabandhaṃ āvuso coraṃ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1100_1: rājagaheyeva bhante aṅgulimālaṃ coraṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1100_2: aṅgulimālo bhante coro bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti,
anya-e0905n:1101_1: kārabhedakaṃ āvuso coraṃ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1102_1: rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1103_1: iṇāyikaṃ āvuso pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1104_1: rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1105_1: dāsaṃ āvuso pabbajentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1106_1: rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1107_1: bhaṇḍukammāya āvuso apalokanaṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1108_1: rājagaheyeva bhante aññataraṃ kammārabhaṇḍuputtaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ aññataro bhante kammārabhaṇḍuputto
anya-e0905n:1108_2: mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti,
anya-e0905n:1109_1: ūnavīsativassassa āvuso puggalassa upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n:1110_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n:1110_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1111_0: Na bhikkhave jānaṃ ūnavīsativasso puggalo upasampādetabbo, youpasampādeyya, yathādhammo kāretabbo.
anya-e0905n:1112_1: mātāpitūhi āvuso ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1113_2: rājā bhante suddhodano bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā varaṃ yāci,
anya-e0905n:1113_3: sādhu bhante ayyāananuññātaṃ mātāpitūhi puttaṃ pabbājeyyunti,
anya-e0905n:1114_0: Na bhikkhave ananuññāto mātāpitūhi putto pabbājetabbo, yo pabbājeyya, āpattidukkaṭassa.
anya-e0905n:1115_1: theyyasaṃvāsakassa āvuso upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n:1116_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ purāṇakulaputtaṃ ārabbha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n:1116_2: aññataro bhante purāṇakulaputto khīṇa kolañño sāmaṃ pattacīvaraṃ paṭiyādetvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni
anya-e0905n:1116_3: vatthāni acchādetvā ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvasi,
anya-e0905n:1117_1: tiracchānagatassa āvuso upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n:1118_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ nāgaṃ ārabbha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n:1118_2: aññataro bhante nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci,
anya-e0905n:1119_1: mātughātakassa ca āvuso pitughātakassa ca upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n:1120_1: sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante aññataraṃ māṇavakaṃ ārabbha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n:1120_2: aññataro ca bhante māṇavako aññataro ca māṇavako mātaraṃ jīvitā voropesi pitaraṃ jīvitā voropesi,
anya-e0905n:1122_1: apattacīvarakaṃ vā āvuso yācitapattacīvarakaṃ vā upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1123_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1124_0: Pucchā – upasampadaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ sauddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1125_0: Vissajjanā – upasampadaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante dve āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1127_1: cātuddase ca āvuso pannarase ca pakkhassa ca aṭṭhamiyā sannipatitvā dhammaṃ bhāsituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1128_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n:1128_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū cātuddesa pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatitvā tuṇhī nisīdiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1129_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatituṃ.
anya-e0905n:1131_0: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhuddeso bhagavatā anuññāto.
anya-e0905n:1132_1: yadā bhante bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “yaṃnūnāhaṃ yāni mayā bhikkhūnaṃ paññattāni sikkhāpadāni,
anya-e0905n:1132_3: so nesaṃ bhavissati uposathakamma”nti tadā bhante bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhuddeso anuññāto.
anya-e0905n:1133_0: Pucchā – sīmaṃ āvuso sammanituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kismiñca vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1134_2: rājagahe bhante bhagavati viharati bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi “bhagavatā paññattaṃ ettāvatā sāmaggī,
anya-e0905n:1135_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso uposathā divasavasena ca kārakapuggalavasena ca kātabbākāravasena ca.
anya-e0905n:1137_1: kati āvuso uposathakammāni tesu ca kīdisaṃ uposathakammaṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1138_6: Tatra bhante yadidaṃ adhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1138_7: adhammena samaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ dhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1138_9: tatra bhante yadidaṃ dhammena samaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1139_0: Pucchā – uposathaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1140_0: Vissajjanā – uposathaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1142_0: Pucchā – vassūpanāyikaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1143_1: rājagahe bhante sambahulā bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1143_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū hemantampi gimhampi vassampi cārikaṃ cariṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1145_1: dvemā bhante vassūpanāyikā bhagavatā anuññātā purimikā pacchimikā,
anya-e0905n:1145_4: imā kho bhante dve vassūpanāyikā bhagavatā anuññātā.
anya-e0905n:1146_1: vassaṃ āvuso upagantvā purimaṃ vā temāsaṃ pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ avasitvā cārikaṃ pakkamantassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1147_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1147_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū vassaṃ upagantvā antarā vassaṃ cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1148_1: sattāha karaṇīyena āvuso pahite gantuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1149_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1149_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū udenena upāsakena pahite na gacchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1150_1: sattāhakaraṇīyena āvuso sattannaṃ apahitepi gantuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1151_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññatarassa bhikkhuno mātugilāna vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1152_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave sattannaṃ sattāhakaraṇīyena apahitepi gantuṃ, pageva pahite.
anya-e0905n:1153_1: kismiṃci āvuso antarāye sati antovassaṃ pakkamituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1154_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1154_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū kosalesu janapadesu vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1155_1: rukkha susire vā āvuso rukkhaviṭabhiyā vā ajjhokāse vā vassaṃ upagacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1156_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1156_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū rukkhasusirepi rukkhaviṭabhiyāpi ajjhokāsepi vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1157_1: asenāsanikena āvuso vassaṃ upagacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1158_1: tasmiṃyeva bhante sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1158_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū asenāsanikā vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1159_1: chavakuṭikāya vā āvuso chatte vā cāṭiyā vā vassaṃ upagacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1160_1: sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1160_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū chavakuṭikāyapi chattepi cāṭiyāpi vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1161_1: paṭissavaṃ āvuso visaṃ vādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1162_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1162_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto rañño pasenadissa kosalassa vassaṃ vāsaṃ paṭissuṇitvā visaṃvādesi,
anya-e0905n:1163_0: Pucchā – vassūpanāyikaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1166_1: vassaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi pavārituṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1167_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1167_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū sandiṭṭhā sambhattā antovassaṃ neva ālapiṃsu na sallapiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1168_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave vassaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1168_1: diṭṭheva vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā.
anya-e0905n:1169_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso pavāraṇā divasavasena ca puggalavasena ca kātabbākāravasena ca.
anya-e0905n:1170_0: Vissajjanā – divasavasena bhante tisso pavāraṇā, tathā puggalavasena kātabbākāravasenaca.
anya-e0905n:1171_1: katīnaṃ āvuso saṅghe pavāretuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1171_2: katīnaṃ panāvuso aññamaññaṃ pavāretuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1172_1: pañcannaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ saṅghe pavāretuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1172_2: catunnaṃ vā bhante tiṇṇaṃ vā dvinnaṃ vā aññamaññaṃ pavāretuṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1173_0: Pucchā – ekena panāvuso vassaṃvuṭṭhena bhikkhunā kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1174_0: Vissajjanā – ekena pana bhante bhikkhunā “ajja me pavāraṇā”ti adhiṭṭhātabbanti bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1175_0: Pucchā – pavāraṇaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1176_0: Vissajjanā – pavāraṇaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1179_0: Pucchā – upāhanaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1180_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ soṇaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1180_2: āyasmato bhante soṇassa accāraddhavīriyassa caṅkamato pādā bhijjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1181_1: sabbanīlikā vā āvuso sabbapītikā vā sabbalohitikā vā sabbamañjiṭṭhikā vā sabbakaṇhā vā sabbamahāraṅgarattā
anya-e0905n:1181_2: vā sabbamahānāmarattā vā upāhanāyo dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0905n:1182_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1182_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū sabbanīlikāyo upāhanāyo dhāresuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1182_3: sabbapītikāyo sabbalohitikāyo sabbamañjiṭṭhikāyo sabbakaṇhāyo sabbamahāraṅgarattā sabbamahānāmarattāyopi upāhanāyo dhāresuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1183_1: khallakabandhā vā āvuso puṭabandhā vā pāliguṇṭhimā vā tūlapuṇṇikā vā tittirapattikā vā meṇḍavisāṇavaddhikā
anya-e0905n:1183_2: vā ajavisāṇavaddhikā vā vicchikāḷikā vā morapiñcha parisibbikā vā citrā vā upāhanāyo dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ
anya-e0905n:1184_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1184_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū khallakabandhā upāhanāyopi dhāresuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1185_1: kaṭṭhapādukāyo āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1186_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggīyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1186_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya kaṭṭhapādukāyo abhiruhitvā ajjhokāse caṅkamanti
anya-e0905n:1186_3: uccāsaddā mahāsaddā khaṭakhaṭasaddā anekavihitaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathentā,
anya-e0905n:1187_1: yānena āvuso yāyantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1188_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1189_0: Pucchā – gilānassa āvuso yānaṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1190_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ gilānaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1190_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṃ gacchanto bhagavantaṃ dassanāya antarāmagge gilāno kukkuccāyanto yānaṃ nābhiruhi,
anya-e0905n:1191_1: uccāsayanamahāsayanāni āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1192_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1193_1: gocammāni āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1194_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ pāpabhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1195_1: paccantimesu āvuso janapadesu vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadā ca guṇaṅguṇūpahanañca dhuvanahānañca
anya-e0905n:1195_2: cammāni attharaṇāni ca nissīmagatānaṃ cīvaradānañcāti imāni pañca bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n:1196_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ soṇaṃ kuṭikaṇṇaṃ ārabbha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n:1196_2: āyasmā bhante soṇo kuṭikaṇṇo etāni pañcavatthūni āyasmato mahākaccānassa vacanena bhagavantaṃ yāci,
anya-e0905n:1197_0: Pucchā – cammasaññuttaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1200_1: pañca āvuso bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā kālepi vikālepi paribhuñjituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1201_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1201_2: sambahulānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ sāradikena ābādhena puṭṭhānaṃ yāgupi na sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchi,
anya-e0905n:1201_3: bhattampi bhuttaṃ na sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchi,
anya-e0905n:1201_4: te tena kisā ahesuṃ lūkhā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā dhamanisanthatagattā,
anya-e0905n:1203_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule gilāne bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n:1203_2: sambahulānaṃ gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mūlehi bhesajjehi attho ahosi,
anya-e0905n:1204_1: antovuṭṭhaṃvā āvuso antopakkaṃ vā sāmaṃpakkaṃ vā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1205_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1205_2: āyasmā bhante ānando sāmaṃ tilampi taṇḍulampi muggampi viññāpetvā anto vāsetvā anto sāmaṃ paci,
anya-e0905n:1207_1: manussamaṃsaṃ āvuso paribhuñjantassa thullaccayañca appaṭivekkhitvā maṃsaṃ paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭañca bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1208_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1208_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu appaṭivekkhitvā manussamaṃsaṃ bhuñji,
anya-e0905n:1209_3: na ca bhikkhave appaṭivekkhitvā maṃsaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1210_1: hatthimaṃsaṃ vā āvuso assamaṃsaṃ vā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1211_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1211_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū hatthimaṃsampi assamaṃsampi paribhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1212_1: sunakkhamaṃsaṃ vā āvuso ahimaṃsaṃ vā bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1213_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1213_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū sunakkhamaṃsampi ahimaṃsampi paribhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1214_1: sīhamaṃsaṃ vā āvuso byagghamaṃsaṃ vā dīpimaṃsaṃ vā acchamaṃsaṃ vā taracchamaṃsaṃ vā bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1215_1: bārāṇasiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1215_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū sīhamaṃsampi byagghamaṃsampi dīpimaṃsampi acchamaṃsampi taracchamaṃsampi paribhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1216_1: gilānassa āvuso guḷaṃ vā agilānassa guḷodakaṃ vā bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1217_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1217_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū gilānasseva bhagavatā guḷo anuññāto no agilānassāti kukkuccāyantā guḷaṃ na bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1218_1: jānaṃ āvuso uddissa kataṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ paññapetvā tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ maṃsaṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1219_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante sīhassa seṭāpatino vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1221_1: pātheyyaṃ āvuso pariyesituñca kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe upanikkhittahiraññato nibbattaṃ kappiyapaccayaṃ sādituñca bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1222_1: antarā ca bhante bhaddiyaṃ antarā ca aṅguttarāpaṃ meṇḍakaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1222_2: meṇḍako bhante gahapati bhagavantaṃ yāci “santi bhante maggā kantārā appodakā appabhakkhā na sukarā apātheyyena gantuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1222_3: sādhu bhante bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātheyyaṃ anujānātū”ti,
anya-e0905n:1224_0: Pucchā – aṭṭha āvuso pānāni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n:1225_1: āpaṇe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n:1225_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā pānāni na paṭiggaṇhiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1227_1: sabbañca āvuso ḍākaṃ sabbañca piṭṭhakhādanīyaṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1228_1: kusinārāyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1228_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā ḍākañca piṭṭhakhādanīyañca na paṭiggahesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1229_1: akappiyaṃ āvuso samādapentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1230_1: ātumāyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ vuḍḍhapabbajitaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1231_1: saṅghikāni vā āvuso puggalikāni vā bījāni puggalikāya vā saṅghikāya vā bhūmiyā ropitāni bhāgaṃ datvā paribhuñjituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1232_2: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante bhagavati viharati saṅghikānipi bījāni puggalikāya bhūmiyā ropiyiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1233_1: vinayamahāpadesasaṅkhātāni āvuso cattāri kappiyākappiyaanulomāni bhagavatā kattha paññattāni,
anya-e0905n:1234_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattāni,
anya-e0905n:1234_2: sambahulānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ kismiñci kismiñciṭhāne kukkuccaṃ uppajji,
anya-e0905n:1235_1: yāvakālikādīhi saṃsaṭṭhānaṃ āvuso yāmakālikādīnaṃ paribhogakālamariyādaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1236_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1236_2: sambahulānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi “kappati nukho yāvakālikena yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1237_0: Pucchā – bhesajjakaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1240_1: vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ kathinaṃ attharituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1241_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante tiṃsamatte pāveyyake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1241_2: tiṃsamattā bhante pāveyyakā bhikkhū sāvatthiṃ āgacchantā bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya
anya-e0905n:1242_0: Pucchā – kathinakaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1246_1: gahapaticīvaraṃ āvuso sādiyituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1247_1: rājagahe bhante jīvakaṃ komārabhaccaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1247_2: jīvako bhante komārabhacco bhikkhūnaṃ gahapaticīvaraṃ anujānituṃ bhagavantaṃ yāci,
anya-e0905n:1248_0: Pucchā – cha āvuso rajanāni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni, kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n:1249_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n:1249_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū chakaṇenapi paṇḍumattikāyapi cīvaraṃ rajiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1250_1: acchinnakāni āvuso cīvarāni dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1251_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1251_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū acchinnakāni cīvarāni dhāresuṃ dantakasāvāni,
anya-e0905n:1252_1: kadā āvuso bhagavā anuññāsi chinnakaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ chinnakaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ chinnakaṃ antaravāsakaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1253_1: dakkhiṇāgirito bhante pacchāgatakāle bhagavā anuññāsi chinnakaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ chinnakaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ chinnakaṃ antaravāsakaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1254_1: aggaḷaṃ ca āvuso tunnañca ovaṭṭikañca kaṇḍusakañca daḷhīkammañca bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1255_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1256_1: vassikasāṭikā ca āvuso āgantukabhattañca gamikabhattañca gilānabhattañca gilānupaṭṭhākabhattañca gilānabhesajjañca
anya-e0905n:1256_2: dhuvayāgu ca bhikkhunisaṅghassa udakasāṭikācāti imā aṭṭha bhagavatā kattha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n:1257_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante visākhaṃ migāramātaraṃ ārabbha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n:1257_2: visākhā bhante migāramātā bhagavantaṃ aṭṭhavarāni yāci,
anya-e0905n:1258_1: bhagavatā āvuso mātāpitūnaṃ dānaṃ anujānitvā saddhādeyyaṃ vinipātentassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1259_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1259_2: aññatarassa bhante bhikkhuno bahuṃ cīvaraṃ uppannaṃ ahosi,
anya-e0905n:1259_3: so ca taṃcīvaraṃ mātāpitūnaṃ dātukāmo ahosi,
anya-e0905n:1260_0: Mātāpitaroti kho bhikkhave dadamāne kiṃ vadeyyāma,
anya-e0905n:1261_1: aññatra vassaṃ vuṭṭhena āvuso aññatra cīvarabhāgaṃ sādiyantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1262_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1262_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto aññatra vassaṃ vuṭṭho aññatra cīvarabhāgaṃ sādiyi,
anya-e0905n:1263_1: anāthakaṃ āvuso bhikkhuṃ gilānaṃ na upaṭṭhahantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1264_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1264_2: bhagavati bhante sāvatthiyaṃ viharati aññatarassa bhikkhuno kucchivikārābādho ahosi,
anya-e0905n:1265_1: naggiyaṃ āvuso titthiyasamādānaṃ samādiyantassa thullaccayaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1266_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1266_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu naggiyaṃ titthiyasamādānaṃ samādiyi,
anya-e0905n:1267_1: sabbanīlakāni vā āvuso cīvarāni sabbapītakāni vā sabbalohitakāni vā sabbamañjiṭṭhakāni vā sabbakaṇhānivāti
anya-e0905n:1267_2: evarūpāni cīvarāni dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1268_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1268_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū sabbanīlakādīni cīvarāni dhāresuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1269_1: kañcukaṃ vā āvuso veṭhanaṃ vā dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1270_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1270_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kañcukampi dhāresuṃ veṭhanampi dhāresuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1271_0: Pucchā – cīvarasaññuttaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1274_1: suddhaṃ āvuso bhikkhuṃ anāpattikaṃ avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe ukkhipantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1275_1: campāyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1275_2: bhagavati bhante campāyaṃ viharati sambahulā bhikkhū kāsīsu vāsabhagāme suddhaṃ kassapagottaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpattikaṃ avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe ukkhipiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1276_0: Pucchā – campeyyakaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1277_0: Vissajjanā – campeyyakaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n:1279_1: bhedagarukehi bhikkhave bhikkhūhi na so bhikkhu āpattiyā adassane ukkhipitabboti ca,
anya-e0905n:1279_2: bhedagarukena bhikkhave bhikkhunā paresampi saddhāya āpattidesetabbāti ca āvuso ayaṃ sāmaggirasaovādo bhagavatā kattha dinno,
anya-e0905n:1280_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha dinno,
anya-e0905n:1280_2: bhagavati bhante kosambiyaṃ viharati aññataro bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpanno ahosi,
anya-e0905n:1280_3: so tassā āpattiyā āpatti diṭṭhi ahosi,
anya-e0905n:1280_4: aññe bhikkhū tassā āpattiyā anāpatti diṭṭhino ahesuṃ.
anya-e0905n:1280_5: So aparena samayena tassā āpattiyā anāpattidiṭṭhi ahosi,
anya-e0905n:1280_6: aññe bhikkhū tassā āpattiyā āpattidiṭṭhino ahesuṃ.
anya-e0905n:1280_7: Atha kho te bhante bhikkhū sāmaggiṃ labhitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ āpattiyā adassane ukkhipiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1281_1: saṅghabhedassa āvuso mūlabhūte bhikkhumhi ukkhittake osārite tassa vatthussa vūpasamāya saṅghasāmaggiñca
anya-e0905n:1281_2: kātuṃ sāmaggī uposathañca kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1282_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante teyeva ukkhittakānuvattake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1282_2: te bhante ukkhittakānuvattakā bhikkhū taṃ ukkhittakaṃ bhikkhuṃ osāretvā yena ukkhepakā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamiṃsu
anya-e0905n:1282_3: upasaṅkamitvā te ukkhepake bhikkhū ekadavocuṃ “yasmiṃ āvuso vatthusmiṃ ahosi saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṃ kalaho
anya-e0905n:1282_4: viggaho vivādo saṅghabhedo saṅgharāji saṅghavavatthānaṃ saṅghanānākaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1282_5: so eso bhikkhuṃ āpanno ca ukkhitto ca passi ca osārito ca,
anya-e0905n:1282_6: handa mayaṃ āvuso tassa vatthussa vūpasamāya saṅghasāmaggiṃ karomā”ti,
anya-e0905n:1283_0: Pucchā – kosambakaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1284_0: Vissajjanā – kosambakaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n:1287_1: bhaṇḍanādikārakassa āvuso bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1288_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante paṇḍukalohitake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1288_2: paṇḍukalohitakā bhante bhikkhū attanā bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā,
anya-e0905n:1288_3: yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0905n:1288_4: evamāhaṃsu “mā kho tumhe āyasmanto eso ajesi,
anya-e0905n:1288_6: tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca,
anya-e0905n:1288_10: uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0905n:1289_1: tajjanīyakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno katisu vattesu sammā vattantassa taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1290_1: aṭṭhārasasu bhante vattesu sammā vattantassa tajjanīyakammakatassa bhikkhuno taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā sāvatthiyaṃ anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1290_2: teyeva paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū saṅghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattitvā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā yāciṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1291_1: bālassa āvuso abyattassa āpattibahulassa anapadānassa gihisaṃsaṭṭhassa ananulomikehi gihisaṃsaggehi niyassakammaṃ kātuṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1292_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ seyyasakaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1292_2: āyasmā bhante seyyasako bālo ahosi abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno gihisaṃsaṭṭho vihāsi ananulomikehi gihisaṃsaggehi,
anya-e0905n:1293_1: niyassakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno katisu vattesu sammā vattantassa taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1294_1: aṭṭhārasasu bhante vattesu sammā vattantassa niyassa kammakatassa bhikkhuno taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1294_7: evamādīsu bhante aṭṭhārasasu vattesu sammā vattantassa niyassakammakatassa bhikkhuno taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1295_1: kuladūsakassa āvuso pāpasamācārassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1296_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1296_2: assajipunabbasukā bhante bhikkhū kīṭāgirismiṃ kuladūsakā ahesuṃ pāpasamācārā,
anya-e0905n:1297_2: saddhaṃ āvuso pasannaṃ gahapatiṃ dāyakaṃ kārakaṃ saṅghupaṭṭhākaṃ hīnena khuṃsentassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1298_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ sudhammaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1298_2: bhagavati bhante sāvatthiyaṃ viharati āyasmā sudhammo macchikāsaṇḍe cittaṃ gahapatiṃ saddhaṃ pasannaṃ
anya-e0905n:1298_3: dāyakaṃ kārakaṃ saṅghupaṭṭhākaṃ hīnena khuṃsesi hīnena vambhesi,
anya-e0905n:1299_0: Tenahi bhikkhave saṅgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ karotu “citto te gahapati khamāpetabbo”ti –
anya-e0905n:1300_1: paṭisāraṇīyakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno anudūtaṃ dātuñca tena anudūtena saddhiṃ gantvā yathākhuṃsitaṃ
anya-e0905n:1300_2: gahapatiṃ khamāpetuṃ ca bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1301_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃyeva sudhammaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1301_2: āyasmā bhante sudhammo macchikāsaṇḍaṃ gantvā maṅkubhūto nāsakkhi cittaṃ gahapatiṃ khamāpetuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1302_1: paṭisāraṇīyakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno katisu vattesu sammā vattantassa taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1303_1: aṭṭhārasasu bhante vattesu sammā vattantassa paṭisāraṇīya kammakatassa bhikkhuno taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1304_1: āpattiṃ āvuso āpajjitvā taṃ āpattiṃ passituṃ vā paṭikātuṃ vā na icchantassa bhikkhuno āpattiyā adassane
anya-e0905n:1304_2: vā appaṭikamme vā ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1305_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1305_2: āyasmā bhante channo āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchi taṃ āpattiṃ passituṃ vā paṭikātuṃ vā,
anya-e0905n:1306_1: āpattiyā āvuso adassanena vā appaṭikamme vā ukkhepanīya kammakatena bhikkhunā katisu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1307_0: Vissajjanā – tecattālīsāya bhante vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1308_1: ukkhepanīyakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno sammā vattantassa taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1309_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃyeva channaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1309_2: āyasmā bhante channo saṅghena āpattiyā adassane vā appaṭikamme vā ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattesi
anya-e0905n:1309_3: lomaṃpātesi netthāraṃ vattesi saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiyā yāci,
anya-e0905n:1310_1: pāpikaṃ āvuso diṭṭhiṃ gahetvā taṃ diṭṭhiṃ na paṭinissajjantassa pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1311_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1311_2: bhagavati bhante sāvatthiyaṃ viharati ariṭṭhassa nāma bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ
anya-e0905n:1311_3: diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ ahosi “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
anya-e0905n:1312_1: pāpikāya āvuso diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammakatena bhikkhunā katisu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1313_0: Vissajjanā – tecattālīsāya bhante vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1314_0: Pucchā – kammakkhandhakaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidāni saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1317_1: pārivāsikassa āvuso pakatattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhivādanādīni sādiyantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1318_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante pārivāsike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1318_2: pārivāsikā bhante bhikkhū sādiyiṃsu pakatattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhivādanādīni,
anya-e0905n:1319_0: Pucchā – pārivāsikena āvuso bhikkhunā katisu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1320_0: Vissajjanā – pārivāsikena bhante bhikkhunā catunavutiyā vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1321_0: Pucchā – pārivāsikaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1322_0: Vissajjanā – pārivāsikaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n:1324_0: Pucchā – samuccayaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1325_0: Vissajjanā – samuccayaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n:1327_1: asammukhībhūtānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyaṃ vā niyassaṃ vā pabbājanīyaṃ vā paṭisāraṇīyaṃ vā ukkhepanīyaṃ
anya-e0905n:1327_2: vā kammaṃ karontassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1328_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1328_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū asammukhībhūtānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṃ akaṃsu tajjanīyampi niyassampi pabbājanīyampi paṭisāraṇīyampi ukkhepanīyampi,
anya-e0905n:1329_1: sativepullapattassa āvuso bhikkhuno sativinayaṃ dānaṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1330_1: rājagahe bhante mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ mettiyabhūmajakā bhante bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ
anya-e0905n:1332_5: tassa saṅgho sativinayaṃ deti dhammena samaggena,
anya-e0905n:1332_6: imāni kho bhante pañca dhammikāni sati vinayassa dānāni.
anya-e0905n:1333_1: amūḷhassa āvuso bhikkhuno amūḷhavinayaṃ dātuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1334_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1334_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū gaggaṃ bhikkhuṃ ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena ajjhāciṇṇena āpattiyā codesuṃ “saratā yasmā evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti,
anya-e0905n:1334_3: so evaṃ vadeti “ahaṃ kho āvuso ummattako ahosi cittavipariyāsakato,
anya-e0905n:1334_4: tena me ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhāciṇṇaṃ bhāsitaparikkantaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1334_7: Evampi naṃ vuccamānā codenteva “saratā yasmā evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti,
anya-e0905n:1335_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso adhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni, vibhajitvā kathehi.
anya-e0905n:1336_2: idha bhante bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpanno hoti,
anya-e0905n:1336_3: tamenaṃ codeti saṅgho vā sambahulā vā ekapuggalo vā “saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti,
anya-e0905n:1336_4: so saramānova evaṃ vadeti “na kho ahaṃ āvuso sarāmi evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti.
anya-e0905n:1336_5: Añño saramānova evaṃ vadeti “sarāmi kho ahaṃ āvuso yathā supinantenā”ti.
anya-e0905n:1336_6: Añño anummattakova ummattakālayaṃ karoti “ahampi kho evaṃ karomi,
anya-e0905n:1336_12: Imāni kho bhante tīṇi adhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni.
anya-e0905n:1337_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso dhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni, vibhajitvā kathehi.
anya-e0905n:1338_2: idha bhante bhikkhu ummattako hoti cittavipariyāsakato tena ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhāciṇṇaṃ hoti bhāsitaparikkantaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1338_3: tamenaṃ codeti saṅgho vā sambahulā vā ekapuggalo vā “saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti,
anya-e0905n:1338_4: so assaramānova evaṃ vadeti “na kho ahaṃ āvuso sarāmi evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti.
anya-e0905n:1338_5: Aññopi assaramānova evaṃ vadeti “sarāmi kho ahaṃ āvuso yathā supinantenā”ti.
anya-e0905n:1338_6: Aññopi ummattakova ummattakālayaṃ karoti “ahampi evaṃ karomi,
anya-e0905n:1338_10: Esaṃ bhante tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgho amūḷhavinayaṃ deti,
anya-e0905n:1338_12: Imāni kho bhante tīṇi dhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni.
anya-e0905n:1339_1: appaṭiññāya āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyādīni kammāni karontassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1340_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1340_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū appaṭiññāya bhikkhūnaṃ kammāni akaṃsu tajjanīyādīni,
anya-e0905n:1341_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso adhammikaṃ hoti paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1342_1: aññathā bhante āpattiṃ āpajjantassa aññathā paṭijānantassa yathā so paṭijānāti,
anya-e0905n:1342_3: evaṃ kho bhante adhammikaṃ hoti paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1343_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso dhammikaṃ hoti paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1344_1: yaṃ bhante āpattiṃ āpajjantassa tameva paṭijānantassa teneva saṅgho kāreti,
anya-e0905n:1345_1: yebhuyyasikāya āvuso adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1346_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1346_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṃ mukhasattīhi vitudantā vihariṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1347_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso adhikaraṇaṃ yebhuyyasikāya vūpasametabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1348_1: pañcahi bhante aṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu salākaggāhāpako sammannitabbo,
anya-e0905n:1348_2: tena bhante salākaggāhāpakena salākā gāhātabbā yathā bahutarā bhikkhū dhammavādino vadanti tathā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1348_3: evaṃ kho bhante yebhuyyasikāya adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1350_12: ime kho bhante dasa adhammikā kalākaggāhā.
anya-e0905n:1352_0: Vissajjanā – dasa bhante dhammikā salākaggāhā vuttavipariyāyena.
anya-e0905n:1353_1: pāpussannassa āvuso bhikkhussa tassa pāpiyasikā kammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1354_1: rājagahe bhante upavāḷaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1354_2: upavāḷo bhante bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno avajānitvā paṭijānāti,
anya-e0905n:1355_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso dhammikāni tassapāpiyasikā kammassa karaṇāni.
anya-e0905n:1356_1: pañcimāni bhante dhammikāni tassapāpiyasikā kammassa karaṇāni.
anya-e0905n:1356_5: tassa saṅgho tassapāpiyasikā kammaṃ karoti dhammena samaggena,
anya-e0905n:1356_6: imāni kho bhante pañca dhammikāni tassa pāpiyasikā kammassa karaṇāni.
anya-e0905n:1357_0: Pucchā – tassa pāpiyasikākammakatena āvuso bhikkhunā katisu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1358_1: tassa pāpiyasikākammakatena bhante bhikkhunā aṭṭhārasasu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1358_5: evamādīsu bhante aṭṭhārasasu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1359_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso adhikaraṇāni samathehi vūpasametabbāni.
anya-e0905n:1360_3: imāni bhante cattāri adhikaraṇāni samathehi vūpasametabbāni.
anya-e0905n:1366_2: atti bhante āpatti kāyato samuṭṭhāti na vācato na cittato,

anya-e0905n:1369_0: Pucchā – samathaṃ āvuso pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1372_1: nahāyantena āvuso bhikkhunā rukkhe vā thambhe vā kuṭṭe vā kāyaṃ ugghaṃsentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,

anya-e0905n:1398_0: Na ca bhikkhave dārupatto dhāretabbo, yo dhāreyya āpatti dukkaṭassa –

anya-e0905n:1400_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n:1400_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū uccāvace patte dhāresuṃ sovaṇṇamayā rūpiyamayā,

anya-e0905n:1402_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,

anya-e0905n:1407_0: Pucchā – upāhanatthavikā āvuso bhagavatā kattha anuññātā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.

anya-e0905n:1409_2: paṭipajjantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,

anya-e0905n:1436_1: tiracchānavijjaṃ āvuso pariyāpuṇantassa ca vācentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,

anya-e0905n:1437_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇiṃsupi vācesumpi,

anya-e0905n:1441_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū ārāme tahaṃ tahaṃ passāvaṃ akaṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1443_0: Pucchā – khuddakavatthuṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1444_0: Vissajjanā – khuddakaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1446_0: Pucchā – pañca āvuso leṇāni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n:1447_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n:1447_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ “rājagahako bhante seṭṭhī vihāre kārāpetukāmo,
anya-e0905n:1448_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso vihārā paṭhamaṃ uppannā, kathañca te patiṭṭhāpi tā.
anya-e0905n:1449_1: ekāheneva bhante rājagahakena seṭṭhinā chaṭṭhivihārā patiṭṭhāpitā,
anya-e0905n:1449_2: te idha bhante saṭṭhivihārā buddhappamukhassa āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghassa patiṭṭhāpitā.
anya-e0905n:1450_1: vihāre āvuso paṭibhānakammaṃ paṭikkhipitvā mālākammādīni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n:1451_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n:1451_2: Chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū vihāre paṭibhānacittaṃ kārāpesuṃ itthirūpakaṃ purisarūpakaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1452_1: yathāvuḍḍhaṃ āvuso abhivādanādīni ca aggāsanādīni ca anujānitvā saṅghikaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ paṭibāhantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1453_1: antarā ca bhante vesāliṃ antarā ca sāvatthiṃ chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antevāsike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1453_2: chabbaggiyānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ antevāsikā bhikkhū buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa purato purato gantvā vihāre paṭiggahesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1454_1: ekena āvuso dve paṭibāhantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1455_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1455_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto eko dve paṭibāhi,
anya-e0905n:1456_1: navakena āvuso uddisantena samake vā āsane nisīdituṃ uccatare vā dhammagāravena,
anya-e0905n:1456_2: therena pana bhikkhunā uddisāpentena samake vā āsane nisīdituṃ nīcatare vā dhammagāravena bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1457_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1457_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū āyasmato upālissa santike vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1457_3: āyasmā bhante upāli ṭhitakova uddisati therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gāravena,
anya-e0905n:1457_4: tattha bhante therā ceva bhikkhū kilamiṃsu āyasmā ca upāli kilami,
anya-e0905n:1458_1: tivassantarena āvuso saha nisīdituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1459_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1459_2: sambahulānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi “kittāvatānu kho samānāsaniko hotī”ti,
anya-e0905n:1460_1: mañce ca āvuso pīṭhe ca dvinnaṃyeva nisīdituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1461_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule samānāsanike ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1461_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū samānāsanikā mañce nisīditvā mañcaṃ bhindiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1462_1: dīghāsane panāvuso asamānāsanikehipi nisīdituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1463_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1463_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū dīghāsane asamānāsanikehi saha nisīdituṃ kukkuccāyiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1464_1: pañca āvuso avissajjiyāni bhagavatā kattha paññattāni,
anya-e0905n:1465_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattāni,
anya-e0905n:1465_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ vissajjesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1466_1: pañca āvuso avebhaṅgiyāni bhagavatā kattha paññattāni,
anya-e0905n:1467_1: kīṭāgirismiṃ bhante assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū ārabbha paññattāni,
anya-e0905n:1467_2: assajipunabbasukā bhante bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ vibhajiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1468_1: aññatra paribhogaṃ āvuso aññatra paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1469_1: āḷaviyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1469_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū aññatarassa upāsakassa vihāraparibhogaṃ senāsanaṃ aññatra paribhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1470_1: adhotehi ca āvuso allehi ca pādehi senāsanaṃ akkamantassa ca saupāhanena senāsanaṃ akkamantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1471_1: āḷaviyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1471_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū adhotehi pādehi senāsanaṃ akkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1472_1: parikammakatāya āvuso bhūmiyā niṭṭhubhantassa ca parikammakataṃ bhittiṃ apassayantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1473_1: āḷaviyaṃ bhante sambahuleva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1473_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū parikammakatāya bhūmiyā niṭṭhubhiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1477_1: kathaṃ āvuso channaṃ sakyakumārānaṃ saha upālikappakena pabbajjā ahosi,
anya-e0905n:1478_1: bhagavā bhante upāliṃ kappakaṃ paṭhamaṃ pabbājesi,
anya-e0905n:1478_3: atha bhante āyasmā bhaddiyo teneva antaravassena tisso vijjā sacchākāsi,
anya-e0905n:1478_7: Evaṃ kho bhante channaṃ sakyakumārānaṃ upālikappakena saha pabbajjā ahosi,
anya-e0905n:1478_8: evañca pana bhante tesaṃ visesādhigamo ahosi.
anya-e0905n:1480_1: pakāsanīyakammaṃ āvuso kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1481_2: devadatto bhante “sarājikāya maṃ bhagavā parisāya kheḷāsakavādena apasādeti,
anya-e0905n:1481_3: sāriputtamoggallāneva ukkaṃsatī”ti kupito anattamano bhagavati āghātaṃ bandhi,
anya-e0905n:1483_0: Pucchā – devadattassa āvuso pakāsanīyakammaṃ kārāpetvā kathaṃ bhagavā pakāsetuṃ āṇāpesi.
anya-e0905n:1484_1: bhagavā bhante devadattassa pakāsanīyakammaṃ kātuṃ paññapetvā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesi “tena hi tvaṃ sāriputta devadattaṃ rājagahe pakāsehī”ti,
anya-e0905n:1484_2: evaṃ kho bhante devadattassa pakāsanīyakammaṃ katvā devadattaṃ rājagahe pakāsetuṃ bhagavā āṇāpesi.
anya-e0905n:1486_1: kathaṃ āvuso devadattena duṭṭhacittena vadhakacittena tathā gatassa ruhiraṃ uppādetvā paṭhamaṃ ānantariyaṃ kammaṃ upacitaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1487_1: bhagavā bhante gijjhakūṭassa pabbatassa chāyāyaṃ caṅkami,
anya-e0905n:1487_2: atha bhante devadatto gijjhakūṭaṃ pabbataṃ āruhitvā mahatiṃ silaṃ pavijjhi “imāya samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ jīvitā voropessāmī”ti,
anya-e0905n:1487_3: atha kho bhante dve pabbatakūṭāni samāgantvā taṃ silaṃ sampaṭicchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1487_4: tato papatikā uppatitvā bhagavato pāde ruhiraṃ uppādesi.
anya-e0905n:1487_5: Evaṃ kho bhante devadattena duṭṭhena vadhakacittena tathāgatassa ruhiraṃ uppādetvā paṭhamaṃ ānantariyakammaṃ upacitaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1488_1: kulesu āvuso tikabhojanaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1489_2: devadatto bhante parihīnalābhasakkāro sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā bhuñji,
anya-e0905n:1490_3: garuko kho devadatta saṅghabhedotiādiko āvuso ovādo bhagavatā kattha dinno,
anya-e0905n:1492_0: Alaṃ devadatta, mā te rucci saṅghabhedo, garuko kho devadatta saṅghabhedo –
anya-e0905n:1493_5: āvuso idaṃ udānaṃ bhagavatā kattha udānitaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1494_2: āyasmā bhante ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi,
anya-e0905n:1494_3: atha kho bhante devadatto yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0905n:1494_4: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca “ajjatagge dānāhaṃ āvuso ānanda aññatreva bhagavatā aññatreva
anya-e0905n:1495_0: Sukaraṃ sādhunā sādhuṃ, sādhuṃ pāpena dukkaraṃ;
anya-e0905n:1497_1: bhedānuvattakānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ thullaccayaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1498_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1498_2: āyasmā bhante sāriputto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “sādhu bhante bhedānuvattakā bhikkhū puna upasampajjeyyu”nti,
anya-e0905n:1500_1: kittāvatā nu kho āvuso saṅgharāji hoti no ca saṅghabhedo,
anya-e0905n:1500_2: kittāvatā ca pana saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo ca.
anya-e0905n:1501_3: salākaṃ gāheti “ayaṃ dhammo ayaṃ vinayo idaṃ satthusāsanaṃ imaṃ gaṇhatha imaṃ rocethāti”,
anya-e0905n:1501_4: eteneva bhante nayena catunnaṃ vā pañcannaṃ vā channaṃ vā sattannaṃ vā aṭṭhannaṃ vā saṅgharāji hoti,
anya-e0905n:1501_9: salākaṃ gāheti “ayaṃ dhammo ayaṃ vinayo idaṃ satthusāsanaṃ imaṃ gaṇhatha imaṃ rocethā”ti,
anya-e0905n:1501_10: evaṃ kho bhante saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo ca.
anya-e0905n:1501_13: evañca pana bhante saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo ca.
anya-e0905n:1502_0: Pucchā – kittāvatā nu kho āvuso saṅgho bhinno hoti.
anya-e0905n:1503_1: idha bhante bhikkhū adhammādiṃ dhammādīnīti dīpenti,
anya-e0905n:1503_7: evaṃ kho bhante saṅgho bhinno hoti.
anya-e0905n:1504_0: Pucchā – kittāvatā nu kho āvuso saṅgho samaggo hoti.
anya-e0905n:1505_1: idha bhante bhikkhū adhammaṃ adhammoti dīpenti,
anya-e0905n:1505_6: te imehi aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi na apakassanti,
anya-e0905n:1505_11: ettāvatā kho bhante saṅgho samaggo hoti.
anya-e0905n:1506_0: Pucchā – samaggaṃ āvuso saṅghaṃ bhinditvā kiṃ so pasavati.
anya-e0905n:1507_1: samaggaṃ kho bhante saṅghaṃ bhinditvā kappaṭṭhitikaṃ kibbisaṃ pasavati,
anya-e0905n:1508_0: Pucchā – bhinnaṃ kho āvuso saṅghaṃ samaggaṃ katvā kiṃ so pasavati.
anya-e0905n:1509_1: bhinnaṃ kho bhante saṅghaṃ samaggaṃ katvā brahmaṃ puññaṃ pasavati,
anya-e0905n:1510_0: Pucchā – saṅghabhedaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1513_1: āgantukānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1514_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule āgantuke bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1514_2: āgantukā bhante bhikkhū saupāhanāpi ārāmaṃ pavisiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1514_9: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tena hi bhikkhave āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ paññapessāmi,
anya-e0905n:1514_11: āgantukena bhikkhave bhikkhunā idāni ārāmaṃ pavisissāmīti upāhanā omuñcitvā nīcaṃ katvā papphoṭetvā gahetvā
anya-e0905n:1514_12: chattaṃ apanāmetvā sīsaṃ vivaritvā sīse cīvaraṃ khandhe katvā sādhukaṃ ataramānena ārāmo pavisitabbo”
anya-e0905n:1514_13: evamādinā bhante āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1515_1: āvāsikānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1516_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule āvāsike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1516_2: sambahulā bhante āvāsikā bhikkhū āgantuke bhikkhū disvā neva āsanaṃ paññapesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1517_0: “Āvāsikena bhikkhave bhikkhunā āgantukaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuḍḍhataraṃ disvā āsanaṃ paññapetabbaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1517_2: paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ pānīyena pucchitabbo” evamādinā bhante āvāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ bhagavatā paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1518_1: gamikānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1519_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule gamike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1519_2: sambahulā bhante gamikā bhikkhū dārubhaṇḍaṃ mattikābhaṇḍaṃ appaṭisāmetvā dvāravātapānaṃ vivaritvā senāsanaṃ anāpucchā pakkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1519_3: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “gamikena bhikkhave bhikkhunā dārubhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā dvāravātapānaṃ thaketvā
anya-e0905n:1519_4: senāsanaṃ āpucchā pakkamitabbaṃ” evamādinā bhante ākārena bhagavatā gamikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1520_1: bhattagge āvuso anumodituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1521_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1522_1: bhikkhūnaṃ āvuso bhattaggavattaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1523_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1523_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū dunnivatthā duppārutā anākappasampannā bhattaggaṃ gacchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1523_3: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “sace ārāme kālo ārocito hoti,
anya-e0905n:1523_4: timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādentena parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā saguṇaṃ katvā saṅghāṭiyo pārupitvā
anya-e0905n:1523_5: gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā dhovitvā pattaṃ gahetvā sādhukaṃ ataramānena gāmo pavisitabbo”ti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0905n:1524_1: bhikkhūnaṃ āvuso senāsanavattaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1525_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1525_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūsu ajjhokāse cīvaraṃ karontesu paṭivāte aṅgaṇe senāsanaṃ papphoṭesuṃ,
anya-e0905n:1525_5: sace ussahati sodhetabbo”ti evamādinā bhante bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanavattaṃ bhagavatā paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n:1526_0: Pucchā – samācāraṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1527_0: Vissajjanā – samācāraṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n:1529_1: sāpattikena āvuso pātimokkhaṃ suṇantassa pātimokkhaṃ ṭhapetuṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1530_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ puggalaṃ dussīlaṃ pāpadhammaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1530_2: aññataro bhante puggalo dussīlo pāpadhammo tadahuposathe saṅghamajjhe nisinno ahosi,
anya-e0905n:1531_0: Pucchā – ṭhapanaṃ āvuso pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1532_0: Vissajjanā – ṭhapanaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n:1534_1: aṭṭhahi āvuso garudhammehi upasampadā bhagavatā kattha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n:1535_2: mahāpajāpati bhante gotamī sūnehi pādehi rajokiṇṇena gattena dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā bahidvārakoṭṭhake aṭṭhāsi,
anya-e0905n:1535_3: atha kho bhante āyasmā ānando mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā bhagavantaṃ catukkhattuṃ yāci
anya-e0905n:1535_4: mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye āgārasmā anāgāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1536_1: bhikkhūhi āvuso bhikkhuniyo upasampādetuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1537_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1537_2: mahāpajāpati bhante gotamī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kathāhaṃ bhante imāsu sākiyānīsu paṭipajjāmī”ti,
anya-e0905n:1538_1: ekato upasampannāya āvuso bhikkhunisaṅghe visuddhāya bhikkhusaṅghe upasampādetuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1539_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n:1539_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhunīnaṃ antarāyike dhamme pucchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n:1544_0: Pucchā – pañcasatikaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1548_0: Pucchā – sattasatikaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n:1551_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n:1553_0: Vissajjanā – sekkhā ca bhante puthujjanakalyāṇakā ca sikkhanti.
